item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，裕信银行与德国政府就收购德国商业银行股份一事进行谈判
item.description: 一位德国政府消息人士周五称，在意大利联合信贷银行收购德国商业银行 9% 的股份后，德国政府官员和联合信贷银行的银行家举行了会谈。【原文：German government officials and UniCredit bankers have held talks after the Italian lender bought a 9% stake in Commerzbank , a German government source said on Friday.】

item.title: 中国对普华永道在中国大陆的审计部门实施为期六个月的业务暂停
item.description: 中国国家媒体称，中国财政部周五就普华永道审计恒大一事对普华永道在中国大陆的审计部门实施了为期六个月的业务暂停。【原文：China's finance ministry on Friday imposed a six-month business suspension on PwC's auditing unit in mainland China over the auditing of Evergrande, Chinese state media said.】

item.title: 纳格尔表示，监管机构将对德国商业银行与意大利联合信贷银行的任何交易进行审查
item.description: 德国央行行长周五表示，当局将 "密切关注 "联合信贷银行（UniCredit）可能收购德国商业银行（Commerzbank）的姿态，这表明任何交易都将受到严格审查。【原文：The head of Germany's central bank said on Friday that authorities would take a "very close look" at UniCredit's overtures to potentially buy Germany's Commerzbank, a sign that any deal would come under intense scrutiny.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，索尼正在洽谈以约 5 亿美元的价格购买平克-弗洛伊德的音乐版权
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，索尼音乐公司正在就以约 5 亿美元的价格购买英国传奇摇滚乐队平克-弗洛伊德（Pink Floyd）录制的音乐版权进行深入谈判。【原文：Sony Music is in advanced talks to buy the rights to music recorded by legendary English rock group Pink Floyd for about $500 million, the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 日本更新国家安全类别列表，Seven & i 更改为 "核心"
item.description: 根据财政部周五公布的最新安全审查名单，日本零售巨头 Seven & i Holdings 被列为国家安全的 "核心"。【原文：Japanese retail giant Seven & i Holdings has been classified as "core" to national security, according to the latest update of the finance ministry's list for security reviews released on Friday.】

item.title: 福特计划在印度泰米尔纳德邦重启制造工厂
item.description: 福特汽车公司周五表示，该公司计划在印度南部泰米尔纳德邦重启一家出口生产厂，有可能重新进入其三年前退出的市场。【原文：Ford Motor plans to restart a manufacturing plant for exports in the southern Indian state of Tamil Nadu, the company said on Friday, potentially re-entering a market it exited three years ago.】

item.title: 台湾希望推迟的 F-16 战斗机在今年年底前开始抵达
item.description: 台湾国防部周五表示，它的目标是在今年年底前交付首批新型 F-16V 战斗机，并将岛内迟迟未能收到这些战机的原因归咎于国际局势的 "剧烈波动"。【原文：Taiwan's defence ministry said on Friday it was aiming for delivery of the first new F-16V fighter jets by the end of this year, blaming "acute fluctuations" in the international situation for delays in the island receiving them.】

item.title: 波音公司称已准备好在工人投票罢工后谈判新协议
item.description: 波音公司周四晚些时候表示，在其美国西海岸工厂工人投票否决临时合同协议并表示将举行罢工后，该公司已准备好重新开始谈判以达成新协议。【原文：Boeing said late on Thursday it was ready to get back to negotiations to reach a new agreement after its U.S. West Coast factory workers voted down a tentative contract deal and said they would go on strike.】

item.title: 德意志银行将标普 500 指数年底目标从 5500 点上调至 5750 点
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）将基准 S&P 500 指数的年终目标从 5,500 点上调至 5,750 点，理由是股票回购不断增加、企业盈利强劲以及受强劲风险偏好推动的强劲资金流入。【原文：Deutsche Bank has raised its year-end target for the benchmark S&P 500 index to 5,750 points from 5,500, citing rising stock buybacks, strong corporate earnings and robust inflows, boosted by strong risk appetite.】

item.title: 中国对欧盟国家的胡萝卜加大棒策略开始见效
item.description: 在欧盟即将对中国制造的电动汽车征收关税进行投票之际，中国政府采用了胡萝卜加大棒的方式来应对这个由 27 个国家组成的集团，一方面威胁要进行贸易报复，另一方面又劝说欧盟主要国家就交易和投资问题进行一对一的会谈。【原文：Beijing, as a vote on EU duties on China-made electric vehicles looms, employed a carrot-and-stick approach to deal with the 27-strong bloc, threatening trade retaliation while cajoling key EU states into one-on-one talks on deals and investments.】

item.title: 英国监管机构称，沃达丰与英国三巨头的交易可能会推高账单
item.description: 英国竞争监管机构周五表示，沃达丰斥资 190 亿美元与 Three UK 合并，可能会推高数百万移动用户的账单，并将网络数量从四个减少到三个，从而影响 Sky Mobile 等供应商。【原文：Vodafone's $19 billion merger with Three UK could push up bills for millions of mobile customers and impact providers like Sky Mobile by reducing the number of networks from four to three, Britain's competition regulator said on Friday.】

item.title: 新日铁、美国钢铁就合并计划致函拜登
item.description: 日本新日铁和美国钢铁公司发言人表示，在媒体报道美国总统拜登准备阻止这桩价值 150 亿美元的合并计划后，新日铁和美国钢铁公司于周日致函美国总统拜登。【原文：Nippon Steel and U.S. Steel sent a letter on Sunday to U.S. President Joe Biden about their planned $15 billion merger after media reported that he was preparing to block the deal, a spokesperson for the Japanese steelmaker said.】

item.title: 货运代理公司 DSV 以 159 亿美元收购德国铁路申克公司
item.description: 丹麦 DSV 公司周五表示，该公司已签署协议，将以 143 亿欧元（158.5 亿美元）的价格收购德国国营铁路运营商德国铁路的物流部门全球国际货运代理公司（Schenker），这项交易将使该公司成为全球最大的货运代理公司。【原文：Denmark's DSV said on Friday it has signed an agreement to buy Schenker, the German state rail operator Deutsche Bahn's logistics unit, for 14.3 billion euros ($15.85 billion) in a deal which could make it the world's biggest freight forwarder.】

item.title: 国泰航空完成向香港政府回购价值 15.3 亿港元的认股权证
item.description: 国泰航空公司周五表示，作为资本重组的一部分，该公司已完成回购2020年向香港政府发行的价值15.3亿港元（1.962亿美元）的所有认股权证。【原文：Airline Cathay Pacific has completed the buyback of all warrants worth HK$1.53 billion ($196.2 million) issued to the Hong Kong government in 2020 as part of a recapitalisation, the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 波音公司美国工厂工人的七次罢工
item.description: 国际机械师和航空航天工人协会（IAM）是北美最大的航空航天工会，代表波音公司美国西海岸工厂的工人。【原文：The International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAM) is the largest aerospace union in North America and represents Boeing's U.S. West Coast factory workers.】

item.title: 96%的工人投票支持罢工，波音工人将举行罢工
item.description: 波音公司美国西海岸工厂 96% 的工人周四投票赞成罢工，工人们将离开工作岗位，停止生产该公司销量最大的喷气式飞机，因为该公司正在与长期的产量延迟和不断增加的债务作斗争。【原文：Boeing's U.S. West Coast factory workers will walk off the job after 96% voted on Thursday in favor of a strike, halting production of the planemaker's strongest-selling jet as it wrestles with chronic output delays and mounting debt.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，特朗普的盟友正在制定房利美和房地美私有化计划
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，美国共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普的盟友和银行家们一直在讨论，如果他赢得大选，美国政府将终止对房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）抵押贷款融资公司的控制。【原文：Allies of Republican U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trumps and bankers have been discussing plans on ending U.S. government control of the mortgage-finance firms Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac if he wins the election, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Star 赌场可能因违反监管规定而被吊销执照或被罚款 6,700 万美元
item.description: 澳大利亚最大州的赌场委员会周五表示，在调查发现 Star Entertainment 公司违反反洗钱协议后，可能会吊销其悉尼执照，或对其处以高达 1 亿澳元（6720 万美元）的罚款。【原文：The casino commission in Australia's biggest state said on Friday it may cancel Star Entertainment's Sydney licence or fine it up to A$100 million ($67.2 million) after an inquiry found breaches of anti-money laundering protocols.】

item.title: 欧洲 美联储超大规模减息重回议事日程
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 大多数分析师表示，日本央行将在年底前加息；9 月份不会有变化：路透调查
item.description: 在周五公布的路透社民意调查中，经济学家一致表示，日本央行（BOJ）不会在下周的政策会议上加息，但大多数经济学家仍预计日本央行将在年底前加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan (BOJ) will not raise interest rates at a policy meeting next week, economists unanimously said in a Reuters poll published on Friday, but a majority of them still expect an increase by year-end.】

item.title: 聚焦：陷入困境的 Northvolt 唤起了人们对欧洲电池未来的担忧
item.description: 行业专家和熟悉情况的人士告诉路透社，Northvolt 本周做出的收缩业务和裁员的惊人决定引发了人们的担忧，即欧洲本土电动汽车电池冠军的最佳机会可能会陷入停滞。【原文：Northvolt's shock decision this week to shrink its operations and cut jobs has sparked fears that Europe's best shot at a home-grown electric vehicle battery champion may stall, sector experts and people familiar with the situation told Reuters.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Blackstone 考虑出售签证公司 VFS Global
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，在收到潜在投资者的兴趣后，Blackstone 正在考虑各种方案，包括出售其在签证申请外包和技术服务公司 VFS Global 的多数股权。【原文：Blackstone is considering options including a sale of its majority stake in visa application outsourcing and technology services firm VFS Global after receiving interest from prospective investors, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本 8 月通胀加速，日本央行加息理由增强：路透调查
item.description: 路透社对 20 位经济学家进行的调查显示，8 月份日本消费者通胀率可能连续第四个月回升，略高于央行 2% 的目标，并保持了未来更多加息的预期。【原文：Japan's consumer inflation rate likely picked up for the fourth straight month in August, a Reuters poll of 20 economists showed, tracking comfortably above the central bank's 2% target and keeping alive expectations for more rate hikes ahead.】

item.title: 日本三菱将从埃克森美孚购买得克萨斯州的股份并承购合成氨业务
item.description: 日本贸易公司三菱周五表示，它已达成初步协议，将购买埃克森美孚位于得克萨斯州的氢气设施的股份，并从该设施承购低碳氨气。【原文：Japanese trading house Mitsubishi said on Friday it has reached a preliminary agreement to buy a stake in and offtake low-carbon ammonia from ExxonMobil's hydrogen facility in Texas.】

item.title: 前纽约联储主席杜德利表示，美联储有充分理由降息 50 个基点
item.description: 前纽约联储主席比尔-达德利（Bill Dudley）表示，美国有充分理由降息 50 个基点。【原文：Former New York Federal Reserve President Bill Dudley said there was a strong case for a 50 basis point interest rate cut in the United States.】

item.title: 交易员加大对美联储大幅降息的押注，美元走软
item.description: 美元周五走软，欧元和日元走高，原因是投资者在下周央行大选前仍然提心吊胆，而下周的焦点是美联储及其预期降息的幅度。【原文：The dollar softened on Friday, with the euro and the yen on the rise as investors remained on tenterhooks ahead of next week's central bank bonanza where the focus is on the Federal Reserve and the size of its expected interest rate cut.】

item.title: 油价延续复苏涨势，为震荡的一周画上句号
item.description: 飓风 "弗朗辛 "在袭击路易斯安那州海岸之前迫使生产商撤离平台，美国墨西哥湾产量中断引发油价上涨，周五油价延续涨势。【原文：Oil prices rose on Friday, extending a rally sparked by output disruptions in the U.S. Gulf of Mexico, where Hurricane Francine forced producers to evacuate platforms before it hit the coast of Louisiana.】

item.title: 美联储大幅减息押注升温，美元下跌，黄金接近纪录高位
item.description: 周五，投资者加大了对美联储下周超大规模降息的押注，此前有媒体报道称，美联储官员做出降息决定的难度将比之前想象的更大。【原文：Investors on Friday ratcheted up bets for a super-sized Federal Reserve interest rate cut next week, after media reports suggested the decision would be a closer call for officials than previously thought.】

item.title: FuboTV 诉迪士尼和媒体巨头的反垄断审判将于 2025 年 10 月开始
item.description: 根据周四提交的一份法庭文件，FuboTV 针对华特-迪士尼（Walt Disney）、福克斯（Fox）和华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）推出新的体育流媒体服务的反垄断审判将于明年 10 月 6 日开始。【原文：FuboTV's antitrust trial against the launch of a new sports streaming service by Walt Disney , Fox and Warner Bros Discovery is set to begin on Oct. 6 next year, according to a court filing on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间竞价本周反弹指日可待，中国数据大爆炸迫在眉睫
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】
